# =========================
# Unity generated folders
# =========================
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

# =========================
# User-specific settings
# =========================
UserSettings/

# =========================
# IDE / Editor files
# =========================
.vscode/
.idea/

# =========================
# Visual Studio files
# =========================
*.csproj
*.sln
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj

# =========================
# OS generated files
# =========================
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# =========================
# Unity packages & builds
# =========================
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage

# =========================
# Crash reports
# =========================
sysinfo.txt
